event.titlec: 竹韻小集「大嶺南紀行」之「超越國度」音樂會
event.titlee: 'A Grandiose Journey overLingnan: Vietnam' by Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時45分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour 45 minutes, including a 15 minute intermission.
event.descc: 嶺南文化是指五嶺以南——廣東、廣西和海南一帶的地域文化，具有獨特的地理環境和歷史條件，以農業文化和海洋文化為源頭，發展的過程中不斷吸收和融會中原文化和海外文化，形成濃厚的包容和開放特性。 竹韻小集「大嶺南紀行」系列每場將以不同主題，用音樂呈現1886年美國傳教士香便文Benjamin Couch Henry (1850-1901) 著作《嶺南紀行》所到之處的風土人情和音樂特點，展現嶺南文化的多采性和多元性。 「超越國度」音樂會由著名指揮家何文川執棒，特邀越南最高音樂藝術學府越南國家音樂學院師生組成的華燈民族樂隊合作演出，成員包括越南當代國寶級藝術家阮氏華燈博士、越南器樂名家吳茶眉及武耀草。音樂會將帶來越南特色作品如《叮叮噹噹》、《西原回歸》、《米鼓》、《家鄉的小竹橋》及《西原豐收節》等，亦帶來香港特色作品《過零丁洋》、《赤柱、赤柱、赤柱》及世界首演委約陸尉俊創作的《蘭桂狂想》，更有風靡東南亞的鄧麗君名曲，體現同屬嶺南文化但不同國度的音樂特色。 越南是位於東南亞的多族群文明古國，然而在歷史和地理上，自古以來也是嶺南的一部份。從公元前204年起，越南已為秦代在嶺南地區以番禺(即廣州)為首都的南越國領土；公元前111年，漢武帝在現今越南的中北部地區設「交趾」、「九真」與「日南」三郡，越南受中國文化影響日深；至公元939年，越南才建立王朝。時至今日，越南與中國傳統文化之間還有很多相似之處。 音樂會前講座「越南的風土人情和音樂特點」於2023年8月7日 (星期一) 晚上8時在香港文化中心行政大樓四樓會議室AC2舉行，由阮氏華燈博士 (普通話) 主講，越南國家音樂學院華燈民族樂隊示範，免費入場，歡迎蒞臨。
event.desce: Programme See Tinh + Remembering Teresa Teng * Crossing the Lingdingyang Stanley, Stanley, Stanley LanKwai Rhapsody ^ Trong Com * Homeland Bamboo Bridge * Return to Tay Nguyen * CropStory * Medley of Vietnam folk songs * Harvest in Tay Nguyen + ^CommissionedWork/World Premiere *Hong Kong Premiere +New Version Premiere
event.presenterorgc: 竹韻小集
event.presenterorge: Windpipe Chinese Music Ensemble

event.titlec: 《與你同航》─ 德國電影精選：失衡人生
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 在德國長大、土耳其裔的Asli與來自黎巴嫩的Saeed一見鐘情，但她的母親反對他們的感情。兩人秘密交往，繼而註冊結婚，婚禮上他們互相承諾保守對方的秘密。秘密漸成了他們關係的主調，直至Asli發現Saeed要她保守的秘密，遠超她所能承載。影片取材自本世紀震撼全世界的真人真事，80後導演Anne Zohra Berrached以靈活的手搖鏡頭和兩位主角真摯的演繹，刻畫出90年代末一段純真但黑暗的關係，在現今道德界線壁壘分明、非黑即白的時代更顯難能可貴。
event.desce:
Asli first sets eyes on Saeed in the mid-1990s at a fairground and is fascinated by Saeed’s charisma and self-confidence. The two students marry secretly even though Asli’s mother is against the relationship. In a mosque in Hamburg, they promise to stay together and keep each other’s secrets. Then Saeed disappears. His decision changes Asli’s life – before it shakes the whole world.
Anne Zohra Berrached’s film comprises several layers that are all of equal importance. It is a love story, but it is also an exploration of cultural differences, truth and faith, trust and delusion. After "Two Mothers" and "24 Weeks", the director once again demonstrates her particular ability to reveal the private lives that exist behind the politics, as well as her great sensitivity when working with actors.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《飛天噴火龍公主》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc: 擁有財富與權力的龍王膝下猶虛，決定請女巫為他獻上後嗣。三枚龍蛋當中有一枚與別不同，竟藏着長有一頭綠色長髮的龍公主。龍公主長大後力大無窮、行如風、動如電，生氣時還會張口噴火。本來人類與龍各不相干，但緣份卻叫龍公主跟人類公主結成好友。只是，人類統治者的貪婪不僅窒礙二人的友情，更破壞大自然的一草一木。
event.desce: When the Dragon King must give to the Sorcerog his second most valuable possession, he offers up his princess Bristle. This drives Bristle to despair and forces her to flee the family cave. She then embarks on a journey of discovery in the world of humans. Among humans, she learns the meaning of friendship and solidarity – and greed, which seems to eat away at men’s hearts.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《自由之境》─ 德國電影精選：失衡人生
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 1992年，灰矇晦暗的德國東部邊境小鎮，一宗駭人命案，一對失蹤少女，兩個素未謀面但被安排一同查案的警探，串連著命案背後不可告人的秘密。在德國統一不過兩年之際，前東德地區百廢待興，警探Markus 對來自西德的同僚Patrick 一見面即擦出衝突火花。兩個人在查案過程中互不相讓，但當真相逐漸浮現，他們才發現自己已身陷險境，進退失據。導演Christian Alvart 改編2014年西班牙導演Alberto Rodríguez 作品《Marshland》同時，也側寫了東西德地區的深層矛盾，寫下時代印記。
event.desce: 1992, two years after German reunification: In the East, most of the old state-owned enterprises are closed down. Those who can, have gone to the West or dream of going there. What remains are the shadows of the past under the East German regime and a deep mistrust against anyone who comes from outside. Just like police inspectors Patrick and Markus, who are supposed to clear up the disappearance of two teenagers. The terrible suspicion of a sex crime is tragically confirmed when the girls’ dead bodies are found, raped and brutally murdered. Who has what to hide and why? When the detectives start to unravel the mystery, they soon wind up in danger themselves...
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《讀心外星人玩轉暑假》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "LittleAllan – The Human Antenna"- International Children's & Youth FilmCarnival 2023
event.predateC: 2023年7月15日 (六) 晚上7時30分 2023年8月4日 (五) 晚上7時30分
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合八歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 8 or above
event.descc: 爸爸媽媽吵著要分手，怎麼辦？內向的小艾倫選擇默默承受、不發一言。直至他遇上熱愛鑽研外太空生物的瘋狂鄰居，自己被錫紙捲成天線跟綠星人來個第三類接觸，他才慢慢學會表達自己的真實情感。只是，一段跨越地球與外太空的友誼才剛萌芽，小艾倫跟綠星人便要說再見。再見是否等如永不再見？
event.desce: On an otherwise lonely summer vacation, the introverted Little Allan is talked into acting as a human antenna for his old UFO-obsessed neighbour who thinks a huge invasion fleet from the outer space is on its way. But what they find is not exactly a huge invasion fleet. When the rickety antenna construction collapses, Little Allan is only barely saved by the alien girl Britney, who is doing a school project about the primitive human race. Now Little Allan has to help her get home, while she becomes fascinated with this tiny example of the human species: Why does this boy keep saying he is fine, even though his parents just got seperated, and he’s clearly not? Is that how all little human work?
event.remarkc: 丹麥語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Danish with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《小淘氣尼古拉：快樂方程式》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "LittleNicholas – Happy as can be"- International Children's & Youth FilmCarnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合八歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 8 or above
event.descc: 如果麥嘜是香港人的共同回憶，那麼小淘氣尼古拉就是陪伴一代又一代法國人成長的經典卡通人物。由作家戈西尼與插畫家桑貝攜手創造出來的小淘氣尼古拉於 1959 年首度出版面世，他穿紅背心藍短褲，總是頑皮愛搗蛋，這次更以獨特方式闖進創造自己的人的生命裏，向法國漫畫界兩大重要人物致敬。
event.desce: Once upon a time, there was a little boy drawn in black ink. This little boy went off to win the hearts of millions of readers. From the school yard to the beach, from Paris to the countryside, join Little Nicholas with his family and friends for exciting new adventures!
event.remarkc: 法語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《尋寶男團Go Go Go!》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "LittleNicholas' Treasure"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合八歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 8 or above
event.descc: 自上世紀五十年代面世以來，由作家戈西尼與插畫家桑貝攜手創造出來的《小淘氣尼古拉》系列一直深受法國大小朋友喜愛，經常改編為電影與舞台劇。本片講述尼古拉為跟死黨們共同進退，甚至千方百計阻止爸爸升職搬遷的大計⋯⋯電影改編自法國作家 René Goscinny 和 Jean-Jacques Sempé 的童書系列 Little Nicholas。
event.desce: What Nicholas loves most is playing with his gang of middle school pals, the invincibles, adorable, yet mischievous, they have all sorts of adventures together and life could not be better! So when his dad gets promoted and announces that the family is relocating to the South of France, his world falls apart. Little Nicholas cannot live without his friends. But the pack has a plan to prevent the terrible relocation: a treasure hunt! The film is based on the French writer René Goscinny And Jean-Jacques Sempé book series Little Nicholas.
event.remarkc:
法語對白，中英文字幕

event.titlec: 《超自然捉怪事務所》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "NellyRapp - Monster Agent"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合十二歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 12 or above
event.descc: 吸血殭屍、狼人、巨嬰⋯⋯妖魔鬼怪並非哈利波特的專利，遠在北方的瑞典一樣鬼怪處處，需要妖怪特務的專業技能，方能保持人與妖之間的和平。要怎樣才能成為妖怪特務？如果你跟片中主角一樣天不怕、地不怕，並且有位住在郊外行蹤神秘的叔叔，那麼⋯⋯你也有可能流著妖怪特務的血！本片於 2020 年在瑞典上映，火速成為票房冠軍，北歐風格的魔幻色彩定能令你一新耳目。
event.desce: Nelly and her dog London is about to spend the fall vacation with her uncle Hannibal. What she thought to be an ordinary fall vacation turns out to be something extraordinary. It turns out that Hannibal does not live the quiet life she thought – he is a monster agent! – the kind who has responsibility for keeping monsters and ghosts where they should be. Nelly discovers a new world full of monsters, vampires and ghosts and embarks on an adventure where everything she once believed to be true is challenged.
event.remarkc: 瑞典語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In Swedish with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《尼高當自強》─ 德國電影精選：失衡人生
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 樂天開朗的伊朗裔家務護理員Nico原來愉快的生活，被一次種族霸凌事件徹底破壞，自此陷入創傷後壓力症的無比痛苦中。有一天她遇到一個來自馬其頓的非法勞工，生命似乎燃起了一絲盼望，但幻得幻失的愛情最終讓她領略到，世上最可靠的還是自己的一雙手。伊朗出生、德國長大的女主角Sara Fazilat同時是此片的製片和編劇，她從個人視點出發，訴說主角Nico在女性、小數種裔及性小眾三重身份下面對的種種不公與壓力，而她真摰而有力的演出，更讓她獲得德國巴伐利亞電影獎最佳年青女演員獎。
event.desce: The self-confident and lively German-Persian Nico loves her job as a geriatric nurse and enjoys the Berlin summer with her best friend Rosa until a racist attack suddenly tears her out of her carefree everyday life. Nico realises that she doesn‘t belong as self-evidently as she always thought. Haunted by flashbacks of the terrible attack, she withdraws more and more into herself. Nico feels that things cannot go on like this and turns to the gruff karate champion Andy. With him she begins a tough training programme which helps her to channel her anger and discover her own strength, but she also loses touch with herself. When Nico eventually meets the Macedonian woman Ronny, a connection develops between the two that causes Nico to question the path she has chosen.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 香港戲劇工程《銀河鐵道之夜》— 北區大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: "Night at the Galaxy Railway" by Hong Kong Theatre Works - North District Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.descc: 《銀河鐵道之夜》是最受日本人喜愛的國民作家宮澤賢治的代表作品，譽為東方版《小王子》的經典鉅著。是點燃了宮崎駿、手塚治虫、藤子不二雄等動畫大師的靈感起源……穿越百年，照亮人心的永恆曙光。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.
event.remarkc: 香港戲劇工程為北區大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: Hong Kong Theatre Works is the Venue Partner of the North District Town Hall
event.presenterorgc: 香港戲劇工程主辦
event.presenterorge: Hong Kong Theatre Works

event.titlec: 《寶貝呠呠豬》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 可能是《寶貝小豬嘜》的升級版，分分鐘挑戰小朋友對寵物與食物的觀點！ Babs 在九歲生日那天收到失蹤多時的外公送來一頭可愛小豬，本來以為可以將愛放屁的呠呠豬當小狗般寵幸，殊不知外公有段制作豬肉香腸的黑歷史。本來平靜的小鎮生活，因為呠呠豬與外公的出現突然風起雲湧，救豬行動一觸即發！
event.desce: This multi-award-winning animation is probably an updated version of the 1995 comedy-drama film Babe, challenging children’s perspective on pets and food in a hilarious way. On her ninth birthday, Babs receives a pig named Oink as a present from her long-disappeared grandfather. She tries hard to convince her parents to keep Oink as their family pet. Can Babs and Oink live happily ever after? What if she finds out her grandfather is secretly taking part in the sausage competition, and preying on Oink’s fresh meat?

event.titlec: 《花仙子森林尋友記》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "Rosa and the Stone Troll"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.predateC: 2023年7月15日 (六) 下午3時 2023年7月16日 (日) 下午5時30分 2023年7月23日 (日) 下午3時 2023年7月30日 (日) 下午3時
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 勇氣與友誼是成長中必經又重要的一課。花仙子個性害羞又怯懦，雖想結識新朋友卻又不敢離開自己的小小花天地。蝴蝶跟花仙子剛好相反，熱愛冒險，渴望每天過得精彩刺激。雖然性格各有不同，只要有勇氣踏出第一步，總可建立真摯的友誼。電影改編自丹麥作家 Josefine Ottesen 的童書系列 The Roselil。
event.desce: People has different personalities, some are more outgoing, some are more reclusive. There is nothing good or bad about it. However, if we can complement each other, the world would definitely become a better place. The same applies to the fairyland in the animation. While Rosa, the little flower fairy living alone in her rosebush, is shy and reserved, her friend, the butterfly Silk, is bold and adventurous. Despite their unlikeness, they need each other to complete their journey of growth and discovery. This animation is adapted from the book series The Roselil written by Danish author Josefine Ottesen.
event.remarkc: 現場粵語配音，不設字幕
event.remarke: Live Cantonese dubbing with no subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《豆丁真漢子》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "Talesof Franz"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合八歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 8 or above
event.descc: 阿媽叫我向左走，我偏要向右走；但 KOL 叫我食西瓜，我就一定不敢食木瓜！身型矮小、一開聲又容易走音的法蘭斯是班中被取笑的對象。他想盡辦法，只想快高長大，脫離豆丁一族。當有網上魁梧 KOL 教授猛男育成秘訣時，他竟不理老友勸告，一於死跟！直至好友突然失蹤，他才驚覺自己把最寶貴的東西忘掉了。
event.desce: Based on the book series by the famous Austrian author Christine Nöstlinger, Tales of Franz tells the story of Franz, who has become the school’s common joke because of his “XS” body size. He yearns for advice from influencers like the muscular and manly Hank Haber. Franz is sick of being mocked, not to mention the fact that he is crazily in love with the most beautiful girl in the class. He needs to change so desperately that he even turns a blind eye to his two best friends Gabi and Eduard! Only when Gabi suddenly disappears does Franz realise what a fool he has been! Can he find Gabi and save their precious friendship?
event.remarkc: 德語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《貓鼠同盟大作戰》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "TheAmazing Maurice"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc: 還記得格林童話那位穿着花衣裳吹着笛子把老鼠引走的魔笛手嗎？如果將魔笛手換上一隻老千貓，一個經典童話故事又會演變成怎樣？《貓》片中主角是隻口甜舌滑的蠱惑貓，一直以來連同一群鼠兄弟穿州過省招搖撞騙，過得招積又快樂。可是，當他們去到另一個城鎮又準備發大財之際，等待着他們的竟是比邪惡更邪惡的暗黑勢力⋯⋯看來老千貓終於遇上機會改邪歸正了。
event.desce: Do you remember the classic fairy tale “The Pied Piper of Hamelin” written by the Brothers Grimm? In the story a man wearing a colourful coat has the ability to rid a city suffering from plague of all mice and rats. What would this classic story be like if we replace the protagonists with a slick tongued cat and his own swarm of rats? That’s exactly what happened in The Amazing Maurice, in which Maurice, the streetwise cat, tries to scam a little town by hoaxing a plague! However, it turns out something even more malicious is already in ferment!
event.remarkc: 英語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In English with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

套票優惠 每次購買「國際綜藝合家歡」系列不同舞台演出 / 電影場次的正價門票，可享以下優惠： 3 至4 場 9 折；5 場或以上 85 折。
家庭套票優惠@北區大會堂 於北區大會堂放映的電影，每次購買同一場次兩張正價門票及一張學生優惠門票，正價門票可獲 7 折優惠。

In English with Chinese and English subtitles
Group Booking Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for stage shows/ﬁlm screenings in the International Arts Carnival (IAC) series, the following concession applies: 10% off for 4-9 tickets; 15% off for 10-19 tickets; 20% off for 20 or more tickets.
Package Booking Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for different stage shows/ﬁlm screenings in the IAC series, the following concession applies: 10% off for 3-4 programmes; 15% off for 5 or more programmes.
Family Screen Discount@North District Town Hall 30% off on standard tickets for each purchase of 2 standard tickets and 1 student concessionary ticket of the same screening at North District Town Hall.

event.titlec: 《小腳板走天涯》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "TheLand Before Time"- International Children's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc: 由史提芬史匹堡及佐治魯卡斯監製，《小腳板走天涯》絕對是動畫史上的一大經典，由電影延伸出來的卡通片集亦成為一代人的共同回憶。《小》講述雷龍小腳板與母親準備前往氣候宜人的地方生活，途中卻遭受暴龍襲擊。頓成孤兒的小腳板記著母親的話，勇敢繼續上路。很幸運，小腳板在旅途中遇上四位恐龍朋友，雖然大家的脾氣、經歷各異，在吵鬧當中仍能互相扶持，建立真摰友誼。
event.desce: Littlefoot, a young brontosaurus, has been separated from his mother after an attack by a sharptoothed tyrannosaurus rex. On his own, he must find a way to the Great Valley where there will be abundant food and water for years to come. Along the journey, he meets up with four friends who triumph over numerous life-threatening obstacles. Presented by George Lucas and Steven Spielberg, The Land Before Time is an enchanting animated family adventure – a wondrous tale of hope and survival.
event.remarkc: 英語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In English with Chinese and English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 《來自猩星的媽媽》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: "The Ape Star"-International Children's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 外表異於常人，是否便不值得愛與被愛？改編自瑞典兒童文學作家 Frida Nilsson 的同名得獎小說，《來自猩星的媽媽》溫柔關注那些被社會排斥的人，以及尚未為世俗所接納的愛。故事主人翁祖娜一直在孤兒院生活，每天盼望有人願意給她一個家。一天，機會來了，可對方卻是一隻舉止笨拙的大猩猩。在旁人的注視下，大猩猩與祖娜真的可以共建一個溫暖的家嗎？
event.desce: There is nothing the orphan Jonna wants more than a mother in Linda Hambäck’s animated adaptation of Frida Nilsson’s award winning novel The Ape Star, a book about outsiders and unconventional love. The feisty young girl dearly wants to be adopted. Jonna will accept anyone, really, so long as her new parent loves Jonna…and only Jonna. But when her potential new mom drives up to the orphanage in an old car, she gets a big shock when the door opens…a gorilla steps out! Jonna is not sure she wants to leave with the big, clumsy primate at first; but ape and girl quickly overcome their physical differences. Can their newfound domestic bliss survive the scheming of a local bully who’s out to separate the two?
event.remarkc: 現場粵語配音，不設字幕
event.remarke: Live Cantonese dubbing with no subtitles

event.descc: 親愛的鼠婆婆生病了，為了替她打氣，小鼠女Yuku 誓要找到在古籍中記載的花朵，一朵長在喜瑪拉雅山上會發光的永恆花朵。就這樣，Yuku 帶著唯一的行李 ── 夏威夷小結他，邊走邊彈唱地展開長征旅程。原來，音樂的威力很強大，可以鼓舞人心之餘，更可打破陌生隔膜，締結友誼。
event.desce: At the top of the highest mountains on earth lives a plant that radiates eternal light – the Himalayan Flower. Yuku goes looking for it to give it to her grandmother, who is seriously ill. She has a long journey ahead, studded with obstacles, including the small bridge of fear, guarded by the wolf! With her ukulele and her songs, Yuku makes friends along the way. They are so precious to embark on the adventure of life.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，中英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with Chinese and English subtitles

event.titlec: 香港戲劇協會《我們所不知道的生活成本》
event.titlee: Cost of Living by Hong Kong Federation of Drama Societies
event.predateC: 2023年7月28至29日 (星期五至六) 晚上8時；2023年7月29至30日 (星期六至日) 下午3時
event.progtimec: 節目全長約2小時，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 2 hours without intermission.
event.descc:
粵語演出
榮獲 2018年「普立茲獎」戲劇獎
與其算盡 不如愛盡
兩對城市中的邊緣人：失業貨車司機Eddie照顧癱瘓的前妻Ani；拮据的大學畢業生Jess應徵做富裕卻患有腦癱的博士生John的私人看護。在新澤西的冬雪下，彌漫著越親越遠的疏離感。 此劇於2016年在美國首演，2018年獲「普立茲獎」戲劇獎以及其他獎項多個提名；2022年更在百老匯上演40場，獲一致好評。
「觸動人心，令人刻骨銘心的劇作。還有，你會捧腹大笑。」 - 《綜藝》雜誌 「扣人心弦、令人振奮、出人意表！」- 《紐約郵報》 「……令我喘不過氣來。這件傑出的藝術品價值連城。」 -  《紐約時報》
編劇：瑪蒂娜·馬佐科 Martyna Majok 翻譯：甄拔濤 導演：羅松堅# 演員：鄧偉傑*、洪節華、梁浩邦、黃婉華
佈景設計：王梓駿 服裝設計：黃葆宜 燈光設計：何昕霖 音響設計：梁梓楹 製作經理：李浩賢
#承蒙大細路劇團批准參與是次演出 *承蒙同流批准參與是次演出
event.desce:
Performed in Cantonese
~ Pulitzer-winning Drama in 2018~
What do we owe each other? Can we afford not to care?
Marginalized individuals in two cities: Eddie, an unemployed truck driver, caring for his paralyzed ex-wife Ani; Jess, a struggling college graduate, working as a personal caregiver for wealthy yet cerebral palsy-afflicted doctoral student John. Under the winter snow in New Jersey, there is a pervasive sense of growing distance among loved ones.
"Sensational! The kind of theatre that imprints on the body and lives in your bones, and, Oh- How you'll laugh!" - Variety
"Gripping, Invigorating and Unexpected!" - New York Post
"......left me breathless. This outstanding work of art is worth its weight in gold." - The New York Times
Playwright: Martyna Majok Translator: Yan Pat To Director: Law Chung Kin* Actor: Tang Wai Kit^, Hung Chit Wah, Leung Ho Pong, Franchesca Wong
Set Designer: Issac Wong Costume Designer: Stephaine Lee Lighting Designer: Coey Ho Sound Designer: Leung Tsz Ying Production Manager: Lawrence Lee
* By kind permission of Jumbo Kids Theatre ^ By kind permission of Wedraman

event.titlec: 香港青少年國樂團《傳奇》音樂會
event.titlee: Chinese Instrumental Concert by Hong Kong Juvenile & Youth Chinese Classical Orchestra
event.progtimec: 節目長約2小時，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 2 hours including a 15-minute intermission.
event.descc: 演出人員 樂團：香港青少年國樂團 指揮︰刁偉樑、黃順榮 客席指揮︰黎家棣 笛子：馬家翹 中阮：梁耀中 節目 合奏：《金蛇狂舞》、《酒歌》、《豐年祭》、《風師爺傳奇》、《電視主題曲組曲》 廣東音樂小組：《柳浪聞鶯》、《連環扣》、《百花亭鬧酒》 中阮獨奏：《孤芳自賞》 笛子獨奏：《白蛇傳》
event.desce: Performers Orchestra: Hong Kong Juvenile & Youth Chinese Classical Orchestra Conductor: Dew Wai-leung and Wong Shun-wing Guest Conductor: Lai Ka-tai Dizi: Ma Ka-kiu Zhongruan: Leung Yiu-chung Programme Orchestra: Wild Dance of the Golden Snake, Drinking Song, Ritual for a Bumper Harvest, The Legend of the Wind Lion God, TV Themes Suite Cantonese Music Ensemble: Orioles Singing among the Billowing Willows, United We Go, Getting Drunk at the Pavilion of a Hundred Flowers Zhongruan Solo: Talking to Myself Dizi Concerto: Legend of the White Snake
event.presenterorgc: 香港青少年國樂團
event.presenterorge: Hong Kong Juvenile & Youth Chinese Classical Orchestra

event.titlec: 中國戲曲節2023：越劇梅花獎星光薈萃
event.titlee: Chinese Opera Festival 2023: A Stellar Meet featuring Plum Blossom Award Winners in Yue Opera
event.descc: 《紅樓夢》 主演：趙志剛／張小君(分飾賈寶玉)、陳曉紅、謝群英、吳鳳花、吳素英、陳飛
event.desce: "The Dream of the Red Chamber" Main Cast: Zhao Zhigang / Zhang Xiaojun (as Jia Baoyu), Chen Xiaohong, Xie Qunying, Wu Fenghua, Wu Suying, Chen Fei
event.remarkc: 集體購票優惠 — 每次購買正價門票4至9張可獲9折優惠；10至19張可獲85折優惠；20張或以上可獲8折優惠。「中國戲曲節2023」套票優惠 — 同時購買「中國戲曲節2023」不同場次的正價門票，可獲以下優惠：3至4場9折；5場或以上8折。上述購票優惠只可享用其一，請於購票時告知票務人員。智惠價 — 透過城市售票網網站、流動購票應用程式或電話購票，除享有半價/集體購票/套票優惠，每張門票更可再減9元。
event.remarke: Group Booking Discount – 10% off for each purchase of 4-9 standard tickets; 15% off for 10-19 standard tickets; 20% off for 20 or more standard tickets.‘Chinese Opera Festival 2023’ Package Discount – For each purchase of standard tickets for different Chinese Opera Festival 2023 performances, the following concession applies: 10% off for 3-4 different performances; 20% off for 5 or more different performances.Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers. Please inform the box office staff at the time of purchase.Smart Price – You can enjoy a further reduction of $9 per ticket, even if you are already eligible for half-price / group booking / package discounts, by booking through the URBTIX website, mobile app or telephone.

event.titlec: 球幕電影︰《尋尋覓覓 - 完美星球在哪裏?》─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: Dome Show: "Hazelnuts - In Search of the Perfect Planet"- InternationalChildren's & Youth Film Carnival 2023
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc:
饞嘴的力量可以有多大？大得足夠展開一場宇宙之旅！整個森林的動物都知道歷勞與妮妮這兩隻小松鼠最饞嘴，牠們可以為了一顆美味的榛子付出一切！一天，牠們聽說在地球以外的行星存在着一顆超級無敵、極之巨大的榛子，為了這顆百年難得一見的榛子，牠們展開了宇宙漫遊。
映後觀星及星圖製作活動 ( 約 60 分鐘；以粵語講解 )* 電影放映後，參加者可以在太空館天台利用天文望遠鏡觀星，和在演講廳參與製作星圖活動，認識星座和太陽系的行星。
event.desce:
What’s your favourite food? How far would you go just to eat it? For the two little squirrels Nino and Lilli, hazelnut is for sure the love of their lives. They would do anything for hazelnuts, including leaving Earth for other planets! Luckily the wise old owl is there to hold them back and explain to them what awaits them on the other planets. Combining the elements of animations and puppet shows, this one-of-its-kind full dome show is an ode to the Universe we are all living in.
Post-screening stargazing and star map making activities (around 60 minutes and conducted in Cantonese)*
After the screening, audiences are invited to observe the night sky at the rooftop using the museum’s astronomical telescopes and make star maps at the Lecture Hall. A perfect way to learn about constellations and our planets in Solar System.
event.remarkc:
粵語對白，不設字幕，耳機系統提供英語及法語選擇
參與觀星活動必須步行上樓梯到天台。參加者應衡量身體狀況考慮是否適合參加，以及是否需要由照料者陪同參加，衣履也應以輕便為主。 * 如天氣欠佳，觀星環節會以室內活動代替。
event.remarke:
In Cantonese with no subtitles. The headphone system offers English and French for selection
Access to the rooftop to join the stargazing activity requires climbing of stairs. Participants should assess their physical suitability and, if necessary, consider the need for assistance from their carers. Comfortable clothing and footwear are recommended. *The stargazing session is subject to weather conditions and will be replaced by indoor activities if required.

event.titlec: 香港流行文化節2023《傾X文化》
event.titlee: Hong Kong Pop Culture Festival 2023 – Culture Café
event.predateE: 20 May, 17 June, 22 July, 26 August, 23 September, 21 October, 25 November, 16 December 2023
event.progtimee: The sharing session will run for about 1 hour
event.descc: 資深音樂文化人黃志淙及張景謙將圍繞五個主題，從多角度探索香港流行音樂文化的不同面向和轉變。分享會期間將會以黑膠唱盤機播放精選樂曲，讓參與者感受不同年代的音樂細節和韻味。部份分享會亦將邀請不同年代及風格的音樂人擔任嘉賓講者作交流分享。
event.desce: Hosted by veteran music culturists Wong Chi-chung and Clarence Chang , the sharing sessions will focus on five topics, exploring different aspects and changes of Hong Kong's pop music culture from multiple perspectives. Selected music demos will be played through vinyl turntable, letting the participants appreciate the details and tunes of music from different periods, and evoke different memories through the great classics. Musicians from different generations and styles will be invited to join some of the sessions.
event.remarkc:
地點：牧羊少年與他的浮萍
每位參加者購買一杯飲品後即可入場參與，座位有限，先到先得。
留座: 2632 7103（ＷhatsApp) 本節目內容不反映康樂及文化事務署的意見。主辦機構有權更改分享會內容及更換講者。 場地贊助: 牧羊少年與他的浮萍

Admission with a minimum purchase of one drink per head. Limited seats available on a first-come, first-served basis.
Reservation: 2632 7103(WhatsApp)

Venue sponsored by Lemna of the alchemist

event.titlec: 香港舞蹈團 國際綜藝合家歡2023:合家歡音樂舞劇《世一衝衝衝》 — 沙田大會堂場地伙伴計劃
event.titlee: IAC 2023: Dance Drama for Families "The Kids in Rainbow Jerseys" by Hong Kong Dance Company - Sha Tin Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
event.predateC: 2023年8月18至20日 (五至日) 晚上7時45分 2023年8月19至20日 (六至日) 下午3時
event.descc: 要做世一，切忌不可一世！憑著熱愛和勇氣，堅持到底，沉著氣向前衝衝衝！香港舞蹈團一班專業舞者與兒童團及少年團逾400位團員，以有趣多元的兒童舞蹈及勵志的歌曲，演繹運動員奪金背後不屈不撓的奮鬥故事。無論在跑道上、球場上、擂台上、泳池裡、舞台上……對夢想的初心，時刻跳動。世界第一的閃亮時刻，從第一滴汗水開始。
event.desce: Be determined, but humble, and one day you’ll be a champion! Move forward with passion and courage, race resolutely ahead, and persevere to the end! Join Hong Kong Dance Company’s professional dancers and more than 400 young talents from our Children and Youth Troupes in a delightful song-filled dance drama telling stories of indomitable athletic endeavour. Together, we will win that gold medal! May your hopes and dreams never be extinguished, be it on the runway, the court, in the ring, the pool, on stage or otherwise. For the flame that courses through our veins is what propels us to victory! Let us begin by toiling with our sweat and tears for that glorious moment in the sun.
event.remarkc: 香港舞蹈團有限公司為沙田大會堂場地伙伴。

event.agelimitc: 最適合3歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待

event.descc: 小小睡房機關處處！誰會從隱形窗、旋轉門探出頭來？暗格又藏着甚麼？波力與波拉等你來探訪，一同展開房間大冒險！
event.desce: This little bedroom is filled with contraptions! Who’ll pop out of a hidden window or rotating door? Who hides in the concealed drawer? Poli and Pola welcome you into their room and embark on an adventure!

event.descc: 隨手拈來幾件日常生活常見物件如波波球和絲巾，就能拋得叫觀眾頭暈眼花，親友佩服得五體投地。跟搖擺馬戲團團員學習拋擲技巧，將波波球玩弄於股掌中，做個見習雜耍員！
event.desce: Pick up an everyday object—a bouncing ball or a silk scarf—and make it fly in the air to dazzle your family and friends. Perfect your juggling skills with Vaivén Circo; experience the life of an acrobat for an hour!

event.desce: DingDing has arrived at the Sheung Wan Civic Centre! This station is only open for a day. We welcome visitors to this one-of-a-kind station, travelling on a tram journey from the stage!

event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023 IAC Plus : “Snap a Pic with DingDing” Parent-child Workshop by Fong Fong Projet d’Art
event.agelimitc: 最適合3-9歲及家長；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 3-9 and their parents; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 集合地點：屈地街電車廠山道入口（派對電車集合點）小叮和你由屈地街電車廠出發，沿路咔嚓咔嚓影個不停，再把照片帶到上環文娛中心劇院——當你說出指示，平行時空的電車風景可能出現眼前！
event.desce: Meeting Point: Whitty Street Tram Depot Entrance at Hill Road (Party Tram Meeting Point)As we set off with DingDing from the Whitty Street Tram Depot, we snap pictures along our journey, later uploading them into the theatre. You may even call out a creative tram scenery and it will appear right in front of your eyes!
event.remarkc: (1) 觀眾務請準時到達集合地點。電車一經啟程，遲到者將不獲安排乘坐電車(2) 每個參加家庭須帶備一部可拍照及發送相片訊息的電子裝置(3) 最適合3-9歲及家長(4) 由一位家長或成人陪同一位小朋友參加(5) 工作坊分為兩部分：第一部分在電車上進行，其後步行至上環文娛中心劇院進行第二部分。(6) 節目全長約1小時15分鐘，不設中場休息(7) 粵語講解(8) 每場節目每人每次最多可購票四張(9) 集合點不設城市售票網售票處、即場售票櫃位及自助取票機，請預先購買及領取門票。(10) 請穿輕便衣服
event.remarke: (1) Audience members are strongly advised to arrive punctually. Latecomers will not be able to ride the tram once the tram has departed.(2) Each participating family should bring a mobile device to take and send photos(3) Best for ages 3-9 and their parents (4) 1 parent or adult with 1 child(5) Workshop contains two parts: 1st part to be held on tram, then walk to the Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre to join the 2nd part.(6) Approx 1 hr 15 mins with no interval(7) In Cantonese(8) Each person can purchase up to a maximum of 4 tickets per transaction(9) There is no URBTIX counter sales service, door ticket counter nor self-service ticketing kiosk at the meeting point. Please purchase and collect your ticket in advance.(10) Please dress casually

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：斯靈斯比劇團（澳洲）《智醒小偵探》
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023:"Emil and the Detectives" by Slingsby Theatre (Australia)
event.predateC: 2023年8月4日(五) 晚上8時; 2023年8月5日至6日(六至日)下午3時
event.agelimitc: 最適合6歲或以上觀眾；6歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 6 and above; children under the age of 6 will not be admitted
event.descc: 埃米爾化身解款員，替媽媽將一筆現金交到住在城裏的祖母手上，怎料未落火車已遇上小偷！埃米爾需要各位的聰明才智，一起組成小小偵探團對付蠱惑老練賊人。精靈屁孩偵探們能否智破奇案？澳洲斯靈斯比劇團重新演繹德國兒童文學之父凱斯特納（Erich Kästner）的《埃米爾和偵探們》，保留原著神髓之餘，更大玩物件劇場（object theatre）、動畫與歐陸城市奇趣，你追我躲，笑料百出！首演時獲澳洲享負盛名演藝大獎海普曼獎。
event.desce: Mother sends young Emil on the train alone, bringing a stash of cash to his grandmother in the big city. Yet even before he leaves the train, his money has vanished! Emil gathers quick-thinking and resourceful children to help him outwit the thief. Can a bunch of kids work together to outsmart the criminal?Australia’s Slingsby brings Erich Kästner’s Emil and the Detectives onto the stage, which won the Helpmann Award for Best Presentation for Children at its premiere. While adhering to the original spirit of this renowned German children’s story, the company draws on object theatre, animation and spectacular European townscapes in this thrilling game of “catch the thief”.

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：斯靈斯比劇團（澳洲）《智醒小偵探》(加場)
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023:"Emil and the Detectives" by Slingsby Theatre (Australia) (Additional Performance)
event.agelimitc: 最適合6歲或以上觀眾；6歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 6 and above; children under the age of 6 will not be admitted
event.descc: 埃米爾化身解款員，替媽媽將一筆現金交到住在城裏的祖母手上，怎料未落火車已遇上小偷！埃米爾需要各位的聰明才智，一起組成小小偵探團對付蠱惑老練賊人。精靈屁孩偵探們能否智破奇案？澳洲斯靈斯比劇團重新演繹德國兒童文學之父凱斯特納（Erich Kästner）的《埃米爾和偵探們》，保留原著神髓之餘，更大玩物件劇場（object theatre）、動畫與歐陸城市奇趣，你追我躲，笑料百出！首演時獲澳洲享負盛名演藝大獎海普曼獎。
event.desce: Mother sends young Emil on the train alone, bringing a stash of cash to his grandmother in the big city. Yet even before he leaves the train, his money has vanished! Emil gathers quick-thinking and resourceful children to help him outwit the thief. Can a bunch of kids work together to outsmart the criminal?Australia’s Slingsby brings Erich Kästner’s Emil and the Detectives onto the stage, which won the Helpmann Award for Best Presentation for Children at its premiere. While adhering to the original spirit of this renowned German children’s story, the company draws on object theatre, animation and spectacular European townscapes in this thrilling game of “catch the thief”.

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：芳芳劇藝《小叮找你做朋友》
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023: "DingDing: Our Friending Tram" by Fong Fong Projet d’Art
event.predateC: 2023年8月11至12日(五至六) 晚上7時30分; 2023年8月12至13日(六至日)下午3時
event.agelimitc: 最適合3歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 3 and above; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 1904年，電車開始在香港島行駛。2021年，近千人「來找小叮做朋友」，和小叮來回屈地街電車廠及中央圖書館。2023年，「小叮找你做朋友」，希望重拾回憶，邁向未來。每輛電車都有自己的編號。編號120的小叮，是所有電車中最年長的一位。119年來，城市不斷發展，小叮卻一直保持平穩的腳步，每天在固定的路軌上行走，盛載幾代人的日常生活。世界分秒在變，科技日新月異，小叮能否趕上時代的步伐？到了未來，他會變成怎樣，會被淘汰嗎？小叮每天緩慢地努力工作，還有意義嗎？芳芳劇藝 2021年上演的《來找小叮做朋友》將表演元素注入電車旅程，大受歡迎。今次小叮邀請大家搭乘劇場內的「電車」，帶着熟悉的沿路風景感受本土氣息，一起窺看未來的樣子。
event.desce: 1904: The Hong Kong Tramways began operation.2021: Several hundred passengers took part in Our Little Tram: DingDing, enjoying a performance-in-transit between the Whitty Street Tram Depot and Hong Kong Central Library.2023: Back by popular demand, DingDing: Our Friending Tram makes a special stop at the Sheung Wan Civic Centre.Registered as Tram No. 120, DingDing has been running on the same tracks on Hong Kong Island for more than a century, witnessing the transformation of familiar landmarks and the city’s development. In light of rapid changes in our daily lives and technological advances, what are DingDing’s prospects? In 2021, Fong Fong Projet d’Art injected performance elements into the tram journey in Our Little Tram: DingDing, winning much popular acclaim. This time, DingDing welcomes you inside the theatre. There we’ll discover local culture and peer into the future.

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：蜻蜓樂團（西班牙）《點指古典音樂會》
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023: "Disconcerto" by Orthemis Orchestra (Spain)
event.agelimitc: 最適合3歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 3 and above; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 指揮未見影蹤，12位弦樂手展開強勁「弓」勢，以指尖掀起狂烈暴風！一眾樂手搞鬼天份直迫音樂才華，彈出彈入擒高擒低，玩轉比才、韋華第、莫扎特等大師經典，個個施展渾身解數，搖滾、舞曲、beatbox 和 moonwalk 盡出，包你笑到有腹肌。不論你聽開貝多芬定〈Baby Shark〉，一齊狂歡一次！西班牙加泰羅尼亞蜻蜓樂團擅長撕開古典音樂正經面貌。2019年來港演出，觀眾血脈沸騰坐爆音樂廳；今次原班人馬重遊舊地，勢必再度令全場爆笑！
event.desce: Before the conductor makes it on stage, 12 string players decide to forge their “brave new world”!These talented musicians make mischief, even racing up and down the stage as they perform tunes by Bizet, Vivaldi and Mozart. Vying to outdo one another, they inject rock’n’roll, beatbox and moonwalking into the mix. No matter whether you’re a Beethoven or Baby Shark fan, join us in this super-fun fiesta!Hailing from Catalonia, Spain, the Orthemis Orchestra is renowned for debunking conventional notions of classical music. In 2019, the ensemble scored a delightful, sold-out debut in Hong Kong. These versatile musicians return this time to bring laughter and joy in the theatre!

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：搖擺馬戲團（西班牙） 《翻滾吧！反斗五人組》
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023: "Esencial" by Vaiv�n Circo (Spain)
event.predateC: 2023年7月28至29日(五至六) 晚上7時30分; 2023年7月29至30日(六至日)下午3時
event.agelimitc: 最適合6歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 6 and above; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 五人小隊個個身手不凡，有勇有謀，將搖搖欲墜的積木國度反轉再反轉！坐在風口浪尖上的搖搖板、爬過怒海中的大拱橋、踩鋼線做一字馬，你敢挑戰哪樣？小隊成員沒在怕──你跌下來，有我接實！受華德福彩虹積木啟發，西班牙搖擺馬戲團將巨大積木遊樂場搬上舞台，實現孩子的終極夢想。積木世界變幻莫測，拱門和柱子組合多端，建築物在觀眾眼前即時裝嵌成形。一小時的雜技演出有如坐過山車，跳躍攀爬等各種高難度動作令人目不轉睛，在驚險和興奮的邊緣來回遊走。
event.desce: In the world of building blocks, which challenge would you dare? Surfing the waves on a see-saw, crossing the angry seas on an arch, or doing splits on a tightrope? It can be whimsical or even dangerous at times, but the five-member team from the Spanish circus company Vaivén Circo knows no fear, always catching their mates in the nick of time!Inspired by the Waldorf Rainbow, five intrepid and agile performers stack life-size blocks in countless configurations, realising every kid’s wildest dreams. Pillars and arches provide endless combinations as numerous structures are transformed before our eyes and new scenarios are devised by the minute. This one-hour acrobatic performance is a highly athletic rollercoaster ride, providing a feast for the eyes in addition to adventure and excitement.
event.remarkc: (1) 最適合6歲或以上觀眾(2) 不設中場休息(3) 表演者經長時間及專人訓練，觀眾請勿模仿「國際綜藝合家歡2023」團體購票優惠^#每次購買四至九張舞台 / 「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」電影節目的正價門票，可獲九折優惠；十至十九張可獲八五折優惠；二十張或以上可獲八折優惠。「國際綜藝合家歡2023」套票優惠^#每次購買三至四場不同舞台 / 「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」電影節目的正價門票，可獲九折優惠；五場或以上可獲八五折優惠。購買每張門票，只可享用以上其中一種購票優惠。以上資料如有更改，恕不另行通知。有關城市售票網節目的優惠票數目及其他詳情， 歡迎致電3166 1100城市售票網查詢。^不適用於購買工作坊及後台導賞門票＃不適用於購買「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」英皇戲院將軍澳康城場次門票。更多優惠詳情及查詢：www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp 或 2734 2900
event.remarke: (1) Best for ages 6 and above(2) No interval(3) Performers have been professionally trained to accoplish the feats perfomed in the show. Audience members are advise not to imitate their acts.“International Arts Carnival 2023” Group Booking Discount^#10% discount for each purchase of 4-9 full-price tickets for stage / “International Children's & Youth Film Carnival” film programmes; 15% discount for 10-19 tickets; 20% discount for 20 or more tickets.“International Arts Carnival 2023” Package Booking Discount^#10% discount on full-price tickets for each purchase of 3-4 different stage / “International Children's & Youth Film Carnival” film programmes; 15% discount for 5 or more different programmes.Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount schemes for each ticket purchased.Programme information is subject to change. For concessionary ticket details for URBTIX events, please call the URBTIX hotline at 3166 1100.^Not applicable to tickets for workshop and backstage tours＃Not applicable to screenings of the “International Children’s & Youth Film Carnival” at Emperor Cinemas The LOHAS. event.predateC: 2023年8月4至5日(五至六) 晚上7時30分; 2023年8月5至6日(六至日)下午3時
event.agelimitc: 最適合3歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 3 and above; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 召喚所有每逢上床時間都扭計唔願瞓的小朋友，同波力、波拉兄妹四圍騰，齊齊將睡房變成遊樂場！「怪物」悄悄潛入房間，與他們闖進大千世界，從華麗舞池、埃及沙漠、食人魚海到太空宇宙，二人關關難過關關過，驚喜一浪接一浪。這隻「怪物」到底是誰？波力與波拉能否趕在瞓覺監督員──爺爺巡邏前，及時回到床上？韓國筆刷劇團最新演出，結合搞笑演繹、動畫投影、燈光效果和現場樂隊，上天下海的百變場景栩栩如生，睡房頓變奇幻世界，在韓國售票點評網 INTERPARK 累積 9.8/10 評分，大人小孩咯咯笑不停！
event.desce: Calling all children who refuse to sleep to join Poli and Pola as their bedroom turns into an amusement park! A “monster” steals in and takes the siblings to a glorious dance hall, the Egyptian desert, an ocean of piranhas, even the Milky Way, and these two children rise up to every challenge. Who is this “monster”? Can Poli and Pola get back into bed before Papa returns?This is the newest production by Korea’s BRUSH Theatre combining comedy with animation and projection, lighting effects and live music, enlivening every scene in this show, transforming the bedroom into a world of fantasy. Poli Pop reigns supreme on the Korean INTERPARK ticketing website with a 9.8 rating (out of 10). This is a laugh-fest for children young and old.
event.remarkc: (1) 不設中場休息(2) 少量英語對白(3) 8月4日及 8月6日設演後藝人談「國際綜藝合家歡2023」團體購票優惠^#每次購買四至九張舞台 / 「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」電影節目的正價門票，可獲九折優惠；十至十九張可獲八五折優惠；二十張或以上可獲八折優惠。「國際綜藝合家歡2023」套票優惠^#每次購買三至四場不同舞台 / 「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」電影節目的正價門票，可獲九折優惠；五場或以上可獲八五折優惠。購買每張門票，只可享用以上其中一種購票優惠。以上資料如有更改，恕不另行通知。有關城市售票網節目的優惠票數目及其他詳情， 歡迎致電3166 1100城市售票網查詢。^不適用於購買工作坊及後台導賞門票＃不適用於購買「國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡」英皇戲院將軍澳康城場次門票。更多優惠詳情及查詢：www.lcsd.gov.hk/fp 或 2734 2900
event.remarke: (1) No interval(2) Limited English dialogue(3) Meet-the-artist session after 4 Aug and 6 Aug Performance“International Arts Carnival 2023” Group Booking Discount^10% discount for each purchase of 4-9 full-price tickets for stage / “International Children's & Youth Film Carnival” film programmes; 15% discount for 10-19 tickets; 20% discount for 20 or more tickets.“International Arts Carnival 2023” Package Booking Discount^10% discount on full-price tickets for each purchase of 3-4 different stage / “International Children's & Youth Film Carnival” film programmes; 15% discount for 5 or more different programmes.Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount schemes for each ticket purchased.Programme information is subject to change. For concessionary ticket details for URBTIX events, please call the URBTIX hotline at 3166 1100.^Not applicable to tickets for workshop and backstage tours

event.titlec: 國際綜藝合家歡2023：一舖清唱《向黑森林琴行前進吧！》
event.titlee: International Arts Carnival 2023: "Voice of the Woods" by Yat Po Singers
event.predateC: 2023年7月21日(五) 下午4時30分及晚上8時; 2023年7月22至23日(六至日) 上午11時30分、下午2時30分及下午5時
event.agelimitc: 最適合3歲或以上觀眾；3歲以下恕不招待
event.agelimite: Best for ages 3 and above; children under the age of 3 will not be admitted
event.descc: 黑森林深處除了動植物，還有各種千奇百怪的東西，例如膠叉、爛波鞋，甚至舊雪櫃……儘管毫不起眼，卻一樣擁有自己的夢想！沐浴露膠樽樽蓋執到一張由黑森林琴行發出的收據，觸發他尋找自我，立志成為一件樂器。追尋音樂夢路上，他遇到信念樹蛙、高傲喇叭咀、負能量蝴蝶，還有一粒迷失的按鈕……大家排除萬難向黑森林琴行前進，他們能成功抵達目的地嗎？香港首個專業無伴奏合唱（a cappella）劇團一舖清唱，毋需樂器，多年來靠把口唱遍大小場地玩盡無數演出形式。今次走入森林，用人聲模仿森林花鳥蟲魚，將死物廢物唱翻生。
event.desce: Once upon a time, in the heart of the woods, besides beasts and trees, there are tons of extraordinary things like plastic cutlery, worn-out shoes and even broken fridges... who says that they are not qualified to have their dreams?This tale is about a shower-gel cap craving for becoming a musical instrument. His adventure begins on the day when he discovered an old receipt issued by "The Woods' Music Store", stirring up his identity mystery. During the journey he met the unwavering Treefrog, the arrogant Mouthpiece, the demoralised Butterfly and a frustrated Button...As everyone advances to the heart of the forest, will they overcome the challenges ahead and reach their final destination? Yat Po Singers, the first professional a cappella choral theatre company in Hong Kong, needs no musical instruments to wield magic and amazement. This time, they venture into the forest giving voice to flora and fauna, great and small. Even inanimate objects and trash have their shining moments!

event.titlec: 上環文娛中心場地伙伴計劃 — 一條褲製作：《金童子》(重演) [早鳥優惠]
event.titlee: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Venue Partnership Scheme - Pants Theatre Production: Drama - "Gweilo" (Rerun)(Early Bird Promotion)
event.progtimec: 主辦者未能提供此項資料
event.descc: Martin Booth隨著父親被英軍調駐來港，在五十年代初來到這片殖民地異域，不同文化的衝擊見證著Martin長大成年。Martin Booth寫下此回憶錄前，本身已是成名作家，他去世前以真摯細膩的筆觸寫下Gweilo這本備受讚譽的傳記。胡海輝聯同本地正宗Gweilo －Micah Sandt（孫麥凱）2016年改編Gweilo為一齣雙語獨腳戲， 以金髮小孩目光看香港殖民地發展。 Gweilo不但獲選為2016年第十屆華文戲劇節暖節節目之一，更獲觀眾及評論一致讚賞。
event.desce: Renowned novelist Martin Booth came to settle in British colony Hong Kong in the 50s when his father was assigned here by the British army. His childhood coincided with how this city grew to be one of the most prosperous metropolises in the world. He has a direct experience of East meeting West. In 2002 he was diagnosed with brain cancer, which induced him to write a memoir of his unforgettable relationship with this Eastern gem. He died shortly after he finished Gweilo.
event.remarkc: https://www.art-mate.net/buy_ticket/67156*早鳥門票將由主辦安排座位
event.remarke: https://www.art-mate.net/buy_ticket/67156*早鳥門票將由主辦安排座位

event.presenterorge: Presented by Pants Theatre Production； iStage and Pants Theatre Production are the Venue Partners of Sheung Wan Civic Centre

event.descc: 承接上回故事，斧頭幫首領「虎太帥」敗於「十兄弟」下仍死心不息， 在「蝦佬」一家前往南方鄉城途中突襲，十兄弟被逼迎戰之餘同時遇上海賊王「張保仔」， 被兩幫將領圍攻下十兄弟這次如何脫險？一場關於勇氣與友情之旅即將展開！十兄弟勢必捲土重來，再次同心協力創造傳奇！

event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 向香港樂壇一代巨星張國榮和陳百強致敬 現場LIVE演繹張國榮 陳百強44經典金曲 故事大綱： 三個自小是死黨的年青人，Leslie、Danny、Paul，各自為理想努力奮鬥， Danny具備音樂天份，甫出道就成為甚受歡迎的創作歌手，聰明的Paul在誤打誤撞下也成為DJ， 而愛唱歌的Leslie雖一直備受冷眼，但仍不放棄夢想，默默咬緊牙關捱過艱辛，最後終成為萬千歌迷所愛戴的歌手。 正當事業處於高峰之時，三人各自面對接踵而來的問題，卻不敢相互傾訴， 最後 Paul因不斷的投機取巧終致賭債累累，Danny苦無作曲靈感竟靠藥物麻醉自己，而 Leslie看著好友的苦況，再回頭面對自己，竟也…

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 音樂劇《星動傳奇》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme : "The Musical Starry Legends" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 滿腔熱誠音樂人Michael受市道及疫情影響，被逼轉型成一名學院代課老師，心灰意冷的他途經禮堂，眼見一班話劇團學生各具音樂、跳舞、話劇天份，但總是為突出自我而爭吵。相反另一校內演唱團隊「Star」異常合拍，更勝出比賽，獲邀參加兩星期後電視台直播的「全民組隊」大賽。 可惜⋯⋯「Star」團員集體中毒，成員不夠半數下將被取消資格。團長「阿樂」發現Michael 是過去傳奇音樂人物，危急下要求他幫忙，並從新組合「Star」參加比賽。 這群少年能否表演成功實現夢想！就要你齊來見証！

event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme : "Viva Las Vegas" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 《戀上拉斯維加斯》音樂劇集結多首耳熟能詳的傳奇流行歌曲。 隨著一首首高昂激情，鼓舞人心的金曲，精彩絕倫的的歌舞表演將帶你進入流行聖地拉斯維加斯，讓你感受不朽作品的震撼。 英語演出中文字幕
event.desce: ‘Viva Las Vegas’ is a musical revue, featuring all of our favourite show-stopping numbers from artists who have performed in Vegas. This non-stop, high-energy and highly-entertaining musical, takes us through all the joys, emotions and heartbreak of what it’s like to be part of the Vegas experience. Come and experience why there’s always a place in our heart for Vegas.English Musical with Chinese subtitles

event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme:2+ Theatre "I am Flying" by Pop Theatre
event.descc: 摸摸頭，拍拍翼，TRY AGAIN!學習是小孩成長必經的階段……鼓勵拾起勇氣，包容不斷嘗試，自信滿滿地向前走！一步、兩步、三步……如同小雞夢想在天際翱翔。
event.desce: Learning is a necessary part of a child’s growth…Encourage the child with more brave heart, let them keep trying, having confident to move forward!One step, two steps, three steps… Like a chicken dreaming in the sky.

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 舞台劇《佛山功夫少年》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme:"Born In A Kungfu Legacy Family" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 一個講述功夫與四代人的故事，百年武術精神的傳承。 功夫是……？ 1925年十六歲的梁山在佛山街頭以一敵四擊退欺壓工人的外國人。 1948年十六歲的梁洪拜師學武，跟着師父四處賣藝。 1992年十七歲的梁國華，面對前途抉擇放下武術，二十五年後一償心願開辦武館，亦讓兒子習武傳承武術。 2020年十歲的梁睿承，於武術大賽初賽一鳴驚人，武術天份高於同齡小孩，但對挫敗難以承受。 梁山，梁洪，梁國華，梁睿承，究竟功夫對這四代人有什麼不同的意義？ 全劇配以香港七、八十年代經典兒歌及動漫歌曲，組成一個充滿新鮮感、笑料百出的音樂劇。

event.titlec: 世界動畫短片樂園 1─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: WorldAnimation & Shorts 1 - International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.predateC: 2023年7月15日 (六) 晚上7時30分 2023年7月23日 (日) 下午5時15分 2023年7月29日 (六) 下午5時15分
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 今年的世界動畫短片樂園分別有兩個為三歲以上小觀眾而設的節目，樂園 1 搜羅了十一部精彩短片，為小影迷帶來一浪接一浪的刺激歷險。喜愛夢幻國度的你可以跟《粉紅吸吸象》內的吸吸象於異域結伴而行；又可以跟《金絲雀要高飛》的小鳥一同體驗自由飛翔的驚與喜；當然還有許多頑皮惹笑的情節，例如《鼠中自有黃金屋》那對為食鼠兄弟與貓咪你追我逐的場面。
event.desce: A great opportunity to view award-winning-animated shorts from all over the world in one go! There are two programmes showcasing over 10 animated shorts respectively for audiences aged 3+. In Programme 1 our young audiences will go through adventures after adventures, be it the journey of a horde of pink-coloured elephant-like creature in The Smortlybacks Come Back!, the experience of a caged canary in the outside free world in Kiki the feather, or the escapade of two mice in Mouse House. It’s going to be an exciting bumpy ride!
event.remarkc: 設粵語介紹
event.remarke: Features Cantonese introduction
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 世界動畫短片樂園 1─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: WorldAnimation & Shorts 1 - International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.predateC: 2023年8月6日 (日) 下午3時 2023年8月19日 (六) 下午5時15分
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 今年的世界動畫短片樂園分別有兩個為三歲以上小觀眾而設的節目，樂園 1 搜羅了十一部精彩短片，為小影迷帶來一浪接一浪的刺激歷險。喜愛夢幻國度的你可以跟《粉紅吸吸象》內的吸吸象於異域結伴而行；又可以跟《金絲雀要高飛》的小鳥一同體驗自由飛翔的驚與喜；當然還有許多頑皮惹笑的情節，例如《鼠中自有黃金屋》那對為食鼠兄弟與貓咪你追我逐的場面。
event.desce: A great opportunity to view award-winning-animated shorts from all over the world in one go! There are two programmes showcasing over 10 animated shorts respectively for audiences aged 3+. In Programme 1 our young audiences will go through adventures after adventures, be it the journey of a horde of pink-coloured elephant-like creature in The Smortlybacks Come Back!, the experience of a caged canary in the outside free world in Kiki the feather, or the escapade of two mice in Mouse House. It’s going to be an exciting bumpy ride!

event.titlec: 世界動畫短片樂園 2─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: WorldAnimation & Shorts 2 - International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.predateC: 2023年7月15日 (六) 下午3時 2023年7月23日 (日) 下午3時 2023年7月29日 (六) 晚上7時30分
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 樂園 2 少了一點刺激，但就多了點點詩意與啟發性，當中多部影片聚焦「友誼」、「包容」與「自身情緒」等題目。《Kiko 仔親親大自然》透過森林動物對付頑皮仔 Kiko 的故事帶出眾生平等的訊息；《天不怕地不怕》教曉大家坦然接受「恐懼」；其他短片如《有熊自遠方來》、《異星人出遊記》和《我的巨人爸爸》等則溫柔訴說朋友與家人之間的情誼與相處之道。
event.desce: Programme 2 offers a less bumpy yet more poetic and inspiring viewing experience. More in focus will be topics like friendship, mutual understanding and emotion. Kiko and the Animals, for example, touches upon the issue of animal right and how human being should coexist with animals harmoniously. I’m not Afraid!i teaches us not to be afraid of the feeling “fear”. Other equally appealing stories such as Blanket, a film by m+m and Papa is Big, I am Small deal with the bonding between friends, family and our loved ones.
event.remarkc: 設粵語介紹
event.remarke: Features Cantonese introduction
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.predateC: 2023年8月6日 (日) 下午5時15分 2023年8月19日 (六) 下午3時
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合三歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 3 or above
event.descc: 樂園 2 少了一點刺激，但就多了點點詩意與啟發性，當中多部影片聚焦「友誼」、「包容」與「自身情緒」等題目。《Kiko 仔親親大自然》透過森林動物對付頑皮仔 Kiko 的故事帶出眾生平等的訊息；《天不怕地不怕》教曉大家坦然接受「恐懼」；其他短片如《有熊自遠方來》、《異星人出遊記》和《我的巨人爸爸》等則溫柔訴說朋友與家人之間的情誼與相處之道。

event.titlec: 世界動畫短片樂園 3─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: WorldAnimation & Shorts 3 - International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.predateC: 2023年7月15日 (六) 下午5時15分 2023年7月23日 (日) 晚上7時30分 2023年7月29日 (六) 下午3時
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc: 樂園 1 與 2 的選片簡單直接，幾句對白，甚至不用任何語言都可令大人小朋友明白影片內裏的意義。樂園 3 則集幽默、感人與睿智於一身，務求為六歲以上的觀眾帶來不一樣的觀賞體驗。《馬雅有隻破壞羊》用瘋狂搞笑的手法道出一個文明的滅亡，叫人驚喜不已；《恐龍一家去野餐》惡搞日本的哥斯拉流行文化；《「友」老虎！》則風格一轉，叫你感動又暖心，而視覺上美不勝收的就有《狡滑動物鬥智飛飛飛》。
event.desce: While Programme 1 and 2 are more self-explanatory, Programme 3 targeting audiences aged 6+ is a blend of witty, thoughtful, and touching animated shorts that requires more reflection and imagination. Malacabra, for example, examines how the Mayan civilisation ended in a crazily funny way. The Zillas Have a Picnic is a playful twist of the Japanese Gorzilla pop culture. My Friend Tiger is a heartwarming story of a human girl and a gentle tiger. Not to mention the visually breathtaking The Fantastic Flying Competition and many more…
event.remarkc: 設粵語介紹
event.remarke: Features Cantonese introduction
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 世界動畫短片樂園 3─ 國際兒童及青少年電影合家歡 2023
event.titlee: WorldAnimation & Shorts 3 - International Children's & Youth Film Carnival2023
event.predateC: 2023年8月6日 (日) 晚上7時30分 2023年8月19日 (六) 晚上7時30分
event.agelimitc: 建議年齡：最適合六歲或以上觀眾
event.agelimite: Age Recommendation: Best for ages 6 or above
event.descc: 樂園 1 與 2 的選片簡單直接，幾句對白，甚至不用任何語言都可令大人小朋友明白影片內裏的意義。樂園 3 則集幽默、感人與睿智於一身，務求為六歲以上的觀眾帶來不一樣的觀賞體驗。《馬雅有隻破壞羊》用瘋狂搞笑的手法道出一個文明的滅亡，叫人驚喜不已；《恐龍一家去野餐》惡搞日本的哥斯拉流行文化；《「友」老虎！》則風格一轉，叫你感動又暖心，而視覺上美不勝收的就有《狡滑動物鬥智飛飛飛》。
event.desce: While Programme 1 and 2 are more self-explanatory, Programme 3 targeting audiences aged 6+ is a blend of witty, thoughtful, and touching animated shorts that requires more reflection and imagination. Malacabra, for example, examines how the Mayan civilisation ended in a crazily funny way. The Zillas Have a Picnic is a playful twist of the Japanese Gorzilla pop culture. My Friend Tiger is a heartwarming story of a human girl and a gentle tiger. Not to mention the visually breathtaking The Fantastic Flying Competition and many more…

event.remarkc: 在門票開售首日 (11/7/2023)，此節目不會於售票處售票，只設網上、流動應用程式及電話訂購。每張門票只限一人進場（包括嬰兒）。本節目每場備有36個輪椅座位，每個輪椅座位可附設1 個看顧人座位。
event.remarke: On the first ticket sale day of this event (11/7/2023), there will be no counter booking. Only internet, mobile app and telephone bookings are available.Each ticket admits one person only (including infant). 36 wheelchair seats, each accompanied with one optional minder seat are available for each performance of the event.
